# Race Results

For York River Yacht Club's 2015 Season

```{r message = FALSE}
library(plotly)

race <- read.csv('../RaceData.csv')

pal <- c("red","blue", "blueviolet","brown4","burlywood4",
         "chartreuse","chocolate4","cornflowerblue","cyan", "darkgoldenrod4")

plot_ly(data = race, x = ~Rating, y = ~Points, 
        color = ~Course, colors = pal, mode = 'markers')

```
